portfolio.title: Dark-Kitchen
portfolio.description: A dynamic, responsive, single-page restaurant menu application. The application is designed for a Dark Kitchen online delivery service and includes a list of dishes that users can order online.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: A weather application that allows users to search for current weather data for any city, providing information for the current day, the next five days, and an extended 30-day forecast.

portfolio.title: Coktail finder

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Website
portfolio.description: An E-commerce application that include JavaScript and CSS elements to implement the functionalities required using Ajax technique and map the response received from the server to JavaScript classes.

portfolio.title: Book List
portfolio.description: A Book List app is created to manage and display a collection of books. Each book is represented as an object with properties like title, author, and ISBN code. You can add, remove, and display books dynamically in the user interface.

portfolio.description: Ash-Mademoiselle is a collaborative exercise, user-friendly full-stack MERN application destined to help you explore and purchase handcrafted, custom-made leather clothing.

portfolio.title: MongoDB project
portfolio.description: A social media application where you can identify entities such as users, user login and sign-up, posts and comments. I defined a schema for each entity using MongoDB's document format.
